description:
The second selection has started. After a few performances, Tsukimori goes to the waiting room. It`s almost his turn but he still hasn`t come back yet. Therefore, Hino, Tsuchiura and Hihara look for him. Hino finds Tsukimori in the locked closet. When they go back to the concourse, everyone is already leaving the auditorium. When everybody has gone home, Tsukimori`s mother and Hino hears him play in the auditorium.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 孤高のヴィルトゥオーソ
